user_info_combo.name: user_id
user_info_combo.description: Numerical user ID of a learner on the edX platform

user_info_combo.name: username
user_info_combo.description: The username of the learner on the edX platform

user_info_combo.name: email
user_info_combo.description: The current default email address of the learner on the edX platform

user_info_combo.name: is_staff
user_info_combo.description: Whether or the user is a staff member

user_info_combo.name: last_login
user_info_combo.description: Timestamp indicating the last time the user logged into the edX platform

user_info_combo.name: date_joined
user_info_combo.description: Timestamp indicating when the user joined the edX platform

user_info_combo.name: profile_name
user_info_combo.description: The full name of the learner on the edX platform

user_info_combo.name: profile_language
user_info_combo.description: Language selected by the learner as their default profile language

user_info_combo.name: profile_location
user_info_combo.description: A location choosen by the learner on their profile

user_info_combo.name: profile_meta
user_info_combo.description: Extra metadata from the profile of a learner

user_info_combo.name: profile_courseware
user_info_combo.description: The courseware under which the profile was created

user_info_combo.name: profile_gender
user_info_combo.description: Gender selected by the learner on their profile

user_info_combo.name: profile_mailing_address
user_info_combo.description: Mailing address provided by the learner on their profile

user_info_combo.name: profile_year_of_birth
user_info_combo.description: A year of birth provided the learner on their profile

user_info_combo.name: profile_level_of_education
user_info_combo.description: The level of education provided by the learner on their profile

user_info_combo.name: profile_goals
user_info_combo.description: The intended goals of the learner provided on their profile

user_info_combo.name: profile_allow_certificate
user_info_combo.description: Whether or not the profile allows certificates

user_info_combo.name: profile_country
user_info_combo.description: Country selected by the learner on their profile

user_info_combo.name: profile_city
user_info_combo.description: City selected the learner on their profile

user_info_combo.name: enrollment_course_id
user_info_combo.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

user_info_combo.name: enrollment_created
user_info_combo.description: Timestamp indicating when the enrollment event was created

user_info_combo.name: enrollment_is_active
user_info_combo.description: Whether or not the enrollment is active

user_info_combo.name: enrollment_mode
user_info_combo.description: Mode of enrollment: mode, no-id-professional, audit, honor, verified, professional, credit

user_info_combo.name: certificate_id
user_info_combo.description: The ID of the certificate obtained by the user. Null if the user obtained no certificate.

user_info_combo.name: certificate_user_id
user_info_combo.description: The user ID tied to the certificate

user_info_combo.name: certificate_download_url
user_info_combo.description: A download URL exclusively generated for the corresponding certificate ID

user_info_combo.name: certificate_grade
user_info_combo.description: The grade of the learner when the certificate was generated

user_info_combo.name: certificate_course_id
user_info_combo.description: The course ID associated with the certificate

user_info_combo.name: certificate_key
user_info_combo.description: An edX platform key associated the certificate

user_info_combo.name: certificate_distinction
user_info_combo.description: The distinction listed on the certificate

user_info_combo.name: certificate_status
user_info_combo.description: Status of the generation of the certificate (downloadable, pending, etc.)

user_info_combo.name: certificate_verify_uuid
user_info_combo.description: A UUID generated along with the certificate to indicate uniqueness

user_info_combo.name: certificate_download_uuid
user_info_combo.description: A UUID generated when the download URL is generated to indicate uniqueness

user_info_combo.name: certificate_name
user_info_combo.description: The name of the learner that is listed on the certificate

user_info_combo.name: certificate_created_date
user_info_combo.description: Timestamp indicating when the certificate was created

user_info_combo.name: certificate_modified_date
user_info_combo.description: Timestamp indicating the last time the certificate was modified

user_info_combo.name: certificate_error_reason
user_info_combo.description: Text to indicate any errors encountered during certificate generation

user_info_combo.name: certificate_mode
user_info_combo.description: The enrollment mode associated with the certificate

user_info_combo.name: id_map_hash_id
user_info_combo.description: A hashed ID mapping learner user ID's to external systems like survey platforms

user_info_combo.name: edxinstructordash_Grade
user_info_combo.description: A grade downloaded separately from the instructor dashboards. This is mostly null for all tables generated by the simeon CLI tool version 0.0.1

user_info_combo.name: edxinstructordash_Grade_timestamp
user_info_combo.description: Timestamp indicating when the grades from the instructor dashboards were generated

user_info_combo.name: y1_anomalous
user_info_combo.description: relic from processes that the edx2bigquery package used to handle

description: Table generated by combining files auth_user-analytics.sql, auth_userprofile-analytics.sql, student_courseenrollment-analytics.sql, certificates_generatedcertificate-analytics.sql, and user_id_map-analytics.sql from the SQL bundle. It was made by the simeon CLI tool. It tracks profile, enrollment, certificate details of learners in a given course.
